hero.title: Botox and Lip Fillers - Natural Beauty That Enhances Confidence
hero.subtitle: Professional aesthetic treatments at high medical standards with natural and impressive results

introduction.title: Real Beauty is Natural Beauty
introduction.description: At our clinic, we believe that real beauty is natural beauty. Our aesthetic treatments are performed at high medical standards with emphasis on natural results that enhance rather than change your natural appearance.

botox.title: Professional Botox
botox.description: Smoothing wrinkles and preventing formation of new wrinkles
benefits: Smoothing forehead and eye area wrinkles
botox.process: Precise injection of botox material to required areas, short and painless process

fillers.title: Hyaluronic Acid Fillers
fillers.description: Lip enhancement and deep wrinkle filling
fillers.process: Gentle injection of quality hyaluronic acid, with results visible immediately

steps.description: We'll get to know you, understand what's important to you, and plan the appropriate treatment together

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Botox and Fillers

questions.question: Are the treatments painful?
questions.answer: Treatments involve minimal discomfort. We use very thin needles and can use numbing cream before treatment.

questions.question: How long do results last?
questions.answer: Botox lasts 4-6 months, hyaluronic acid fillers last 6-12 months, depending on treatment area and individual metabolism.

questions.question: When do you see results?
questions.answer: Fillers are visible immediately, botox starts showing after 3-5 days and full results are visible after two weeks.

questions.question: Are there restrictions after treatment?
questions.answer: It's recommended to avoid intense physical activity, heat exposure, and touching the treatment area for 24 hours.

beforeAfter.title: Before and After Photos
beforeAfter.note: Results may vary between individuals. Real photos of our patients (with their permission)
